mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /*+ NO_MERGE */ CITY_CD cityCd, AREA_CD areaCd, ROOM_TYPE roomType, FACL_DIV faclDiv FROM EZC_FACL WHERE 1=1
AND CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10), FK_EZC_CITY_CD_EZC_FACL(R),SYS_C0011067(C) */
AND CITY_CD != 'EMPTY'
AND AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10), FK_EZC_AREA_CD_EZC_FACL(R),SYS_C0011066(C) */
AND ROOM_TYPE = #{roomType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 숙소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND FACL_DIV = #{faclDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */
GROUP BY CITY_CD, AREA_CD, ROOM_TYPE, FACL_DIV ) ORDER BY CITYCD, AREACD, ROOMTYPE, FACLDIV

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* SQL Body Start */ SELECT EZC_FACL.FACL_CD faclCd ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD grpFaclCd ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.CORD_DIST cordDist ,EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD partnerCd ,EZC_FACL.PARTNER_GOODS_CD partnerGoodsCd ,EZC_FACL.FACL_NM_KOR faclNmKor ,EZC_FACL.FACL_NM_ENG faclNmEng ,EZC_FACL.FACL_KOR_MORP faclKorMorp ,EZC_FACL.FACL_ENG_MORP faclEngMorp ,(REGEXP_COUNT(EZC_FACL.FACL_KOR_MORP, #{morpDelt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) + 1) faclNmKorCnt ,(REGEXP_COUNT(EZC_FACL.FACL_ENG_MORP, #{morpDelt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) + 1) faclEngMorpCnt ,EZC_FACL.COORD_X coordX ,EZC_FACL.COORD_Y coordY ,EZC_FACL.CITY_CD cityCd ,EZC_FACL.AREA_CD areaCd ,EZC_FACL.ROOM_TYPE roomType ,EZC_FACL.ROOM_CLASS roomClass ,EZC_FACL.FACL_DIV faclDiv ,EZC_FACL.ADDR_TYPE addrType ,EZC_FACL.ADDR addr ,EZC_FACL.POST post ,EZC_FACL.TEL_NUM telNum ,EZC_FACL.TRIP_PROP_ID tripPropId FROM EZC_FACL ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_FACL.FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD(+) AND EZC_FACL.FACL_KOR_MORP IS NOT NULL AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10), FK_EZC_CITY_CD_EZC_FACL(R),SYS_C0011067(C) */ AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10), FK_EZC_AREA_CD_EZC_FACL(R),SYS_C0011066(C) */ AND EZC_FACL.ROOM_TYPE = #{roomType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 숙소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND EZC_FACL.FACL_DIV = #{faclDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ORDER BY REGEXP_COUNT(EZC_FACL.FACL_KOR_MORP, #{morpDelt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) DESC ,REGEXP_COUNT(EZC_FACL.FACL_ENG_MORP, #{morpDelt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) DESC ,FACL_KOR_MORP ,FACL_ENG_MORP ,FACL_NM_KOR ,FACL_NM_ENG ,COORD_X ,COORD_Y /* SQL Body End */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}

WITH EZC_FACL_WITH AS ( SELECT /*+ MATERIALIZED */ FACL_CD ,FACL_NM_KOR ,FACL_NM_ENG ,FACL_KOR_MORP ,FACL_ENG_MORP FROM EZC_FACL WHERE 1=1 AND FACL_KOR_MORP IS NOT NULL AND CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10), FK_EZC_CITY_CD_EZC_FACL(R),SYS_C0011067(C) */ AND AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10), FK_EZC_AREA_CD_EZC_FACL(R),SYS_C0011066(C) */ AND ROOM_TYPE = #{roomType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 숙소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND ROOM_CLASS = #{roomClass, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 숙소 등급, VARCHAR2(8) */ ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* SQL Body Start */ SELECT FACL_CD faclCd ,FACL_NM_KOR faclNm ,'KR' morpType ,REGEXP_SUBSTR(FACL_KOR_MORP,'[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) faclNmMorp FROM EZC_FACL_WITH CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(FACL_KOR_MORP, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT FACL_CD faclCd ,FACL_NM_ENG faclNm ,'EN' morpType ,REGEXP_SUBSTR(FACL_ENG_MORP,'[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) faclNmMorp FROM EZC_FACL_WITH CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(FACL_ENG_MORP, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL /* SQL Body End */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}

SELECT EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD AS partnerCd /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL.FACL_DIV AS faclDiv /* 시설 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL.PARTNER_GOODS_CD AS partnerGoodsCd /* 제휴사 상품 코드, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_FACL.FACL_NM_KOR AS faclNmKor /* 시설 명 한글, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_FACL.FACL_NM_ENG AS faclNmEng /* 시설 명 영문, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_FACL.ROOM_TYPE AS roomType /* 숙소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL.ROOM_CLASS AS roomClass /* 숙소 등급, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL.SALE_START_DD AS saleStartDd /* 판매 시작 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL.SALE_END_DD AS saleEndDd /* 판매 종료 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL.CHECK_IN_TM AS checkInTm /* 체크인 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_FACL.CHECK_OUT_TM AS checkOutTm /* 체크아웃 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_FACL.AREA_CD AS areaCd /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_FACL.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_FACL.ADDR_TYPE AS addrType /* 주소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL.ADDR AS addr /* 주소, VARCHAR2(200) */ ,EZC_FACL.POST AS post /* 우편번호, VARCHAR2(7) */ ,EZC_FACL.TEL_NUM AS telNum /* 전화 번호, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL.COORD_Y AS coordY /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL.COORD_X AS coordX /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL.MIN_AMT AS minAmt /* 최저 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_FACL.DETAIL_DESC_PC AS detailDescPc /* 상세 설명 PC, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_FACL.DETAIL_DESC_M AS detailDescM /* 상세 설명 모바일, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_FACL.TRIP_PROP_ID AS tripPropId /* 트립어드바이저 프로퍼티 ID, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_FACL.MAIN_IMG_URL AS mainImgUrl /* 대표 이미지 URL, VARCHAR2(200) */ ,EZC_FACL.IMG_CHANGE_YN AS imgChangeYn /* 이미지 변경 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_FACL.SALE_STOP_DT AS saleStopDt /* 판매 중지 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_FACL.API_SYNC_DT AS apiSyncDt /* API 동기화 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_FACL.CONFIRM_STATUS AS confirmStatus /* 확정 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL.FACL_STATUS AS faclStatus /* 시설 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL.REJECT_CONTENT AS rejectContent /* 반려 내용, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,EZC_FACL.USE_YN AS useYn /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_FACL.FACL_KOR_MORP AS faclKorMorp /* 시설 한글 형태소 */ ,EZC_FACL.FACL_ENG_MORP AS faclEngMorp /* 시설 영문 형태소 */ ,EZC_FACL.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_FACL.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD(+) AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD(+) AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD(+) AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD(+)
AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20), FK_EZC_PARTNER_EZC_FACL(R),SYS_C0011054(C) */
AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_GOODS_CD = #{partnerGoodsCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 상품 코드, VARCHAR2(100), UK_EZC_FACL_01(UK) */
AND EZC_FACL.IMG_CHANGE_YN = #{imgChangeYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 이미지 변경 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_FACL.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_FACL.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_FACL_PK(P),SYS_C0011053(C) */
AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10), FK_EZC_AREA_CD_EZC_FACL(R),SYS_C0011066(C) */
AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10), FK_EZC_CITY_CD_EZC_FACL(R),SYS_C0011067(C) */

SELECT EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD AS partnerCd /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL.PARTNER_GOODS_CD AS partnerGoodsCd /* 제휴사 상품 코드, VARCHAR2(100) */ FROM EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD(+) AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD(+) AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD(+) AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD(+)
AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20), FK_EZC_PARTNER_EZC_FACL(R),SYS_C0011054(C) */
AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_GOODS_CD = #{partnerGoodsCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 상품 코드, VARCHAR2(100), UK_EZC_FACL_01(UK) */
AND EZC_FACL.IMG_CHANGE_YN = #{imgChangeYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 이미지 변경 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_FACL.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_FACL.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_FACL_PK(P),SYS_C0011053(C) */
AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10), FK_EZC_AREA_CD_EZC_FACL(R),SYS_C0011066(C) */
AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10), FK_EZC_CITY_CD_EZC_FACL(R),SYS_C0011067(C) */
GROUP BY EZC_FACL.FACL_CD ,EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD ,EZC_FACL.PARTNER_GOODS_CD

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD(+) AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD(+) AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD(+) AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD(+)
AND EZC_FACL.IMG_CHANGE_YN = #{imgChangeYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 이미지 변경 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_FACL.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_FACL.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_FACL.FACL_DIV = #{faclDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_GOODS_CD = #{partnerGoodsCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 상품 코드, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_FACL.FACL_NM_KOR = #{faclNmKor, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 명 한글, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_FACL.FACL_NM_ENG = #{faclNmEng, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 명 영문, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_FACL.ROOM_TYPE = #{roomType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 숙소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_FACL.ROOM_CLASS = #{roomClass, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 숙소 등급, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_FACL.SALE_START_DD = #{saleStartDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 판매 시작 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_FACL.SALE_END_DD = #{saleEndDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 판매 종료 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_FACL.CHECK_IN_TM = #{checkInTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크인 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */
AND EZC_FACL.CHECK_OUT_TM = #{checkOutTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크아웃 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */
AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_FACL.ADDR_TYPE = #{addrType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 주소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_FACL.ADDR = #{addr, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 주소, VARCHAR2(200) */
AND EZC_FACL.POST = #{post, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 우편번호, VARCHAR2(7) */
AND EZC_FACL.TEL_NUM = #{telNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 전화 번호, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_FACL.COORD_Y = #{coordY, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_FACL.COORD_X = #{coordX, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_FACL.MIN_AMT = #{minAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 최저 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_FACL.DETAIL_DESC_PC LIKE '%' || #{detailDescPc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 상세 설명 PC, VARCHAR2(4000) */
AND EZC_FACL.DETAIL_DESC_M LIKE '%' || #{detailDescM, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 상세 설명 모바일, VARCHAR2(4000) */
AND EZC_FACL.TRIP_PROP_ID = #{tripPropId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 트립어드바이저 프로퍼티 ID, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_FACL.MAIN_IMG_URL = #{mainImgUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 대표 이미지 URL, VARCHAR2(200) */
AND EZC_FACL.SALE_STOP_DT = #{saleStopDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 판매 중지 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_FACL.API_SYNC_DT = #{apiSyncDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* API 동기화 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_FACL.CONFIRM_STATUS = #{confirmStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 확정 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_FACL.FACL_STATUS = #{faclStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_FACL.REJECT_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{rejectContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 반려 내용, VARCHAR2(1000) */
AND EZC_FACL.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_FACL.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_FACL.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_FACL.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* SQL Body Start */ SELECT EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD AS partnerCd /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL.FACL_DIV AS faclDiv /* 시설 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL.PARTNER_GOODS_CD AS partnerGoodsCd /* 제휴사 상품 코드, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_FACL.FACL_NM_KOR AS faclNmKor /* 시설 명 한글, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_FACL.FACL_NM_ENG AS faclNmEng /* 시설 명 영문, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_FACL.ROOM_TYPE AS roomType /* 숙소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL.ROOM_CLASS AS roomClass /* 숙소 등급, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL.SALE_START_DD AS saleStartDd /* 판매 시작 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL.SALE_END_DD AS saleEndDd /* 판매 종료 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL.CHECK_IN_TM AS checkInTm /* 체크인 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_FACL.CHECK_OUT_TM AS checkOutTm /* 체크아웃 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_FACL.AREA_CD AS areaCd /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_FACL.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_FACL.ADDR_TYPE AS addrType /* 주소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL.ADDR AS addr /* 주소, VARCHAR2(200) */ ,EZC_FACL.POST AS post /* 우편번호, VARCHAR2(7) */ ,EZC_FACL.TEL_NUM AS telNum /* 전화 번호, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL.COORD_Y AS coordY /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL.COORD_X AS coordX /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL.MIN_AMT AS minAmt /* 최저 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_FACL.DETAIL_DESC_PC AS detailDescPc /* 상세 설명 PC, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_FACL.DETAIL_DESC_M AS detailDescM /* 상세 설명 모바일, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_FACL.TRIP_PROP_ID AS tripPropId /* 트립어드바이저 프로퍼티 ID, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_FACL.MAIN_IMG_URL AS mainImgUrl /* 대표 이미지 URL, VARCHAR2(200) */ ,EZC_FACL.IMG_CHANGE_YN AS imgChangeYn /* 이미지 변경 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_FACL.SALE_STOP_DT AS saleStopDt /* 판매 중지 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_FACL.API_SYNC_DT AS apiSyncDt /* API 동기화 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_FACL.CONFIRM_STATUS AS confirmStatus /* 확정 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL.FACL_STATUS AS faclStatus /* 시설 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL.REJECT_CONTENT AS rejectContent /* 반려 내용, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,EZC_FACL.USE_YN AS useYn /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_FACL.FACL_KOR_MORP AS faclKorMorp /* 시설 한글 형태소 */ ,EZC_FACL.FACL_ENG_MORP AS faclEngMorp /* 시설 영문 형태소 */ ,EZC_FACL.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_FACL.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD(+) AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD(+) AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD(+) AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD(+)
AND EZC_FACL.IMG_CHANGE_YN = #{imgChangeYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 이미지 변경 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_FACL.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_FACL.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_FACL.FACL_DIV = #{faclDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_GOODS_CD = #{partnerGoodsCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 상품 코드, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_FACL.FACL_NM_KOR = #{faclNmKor, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 명 한글, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_FACL.FACL_NM_ENG = #{faclNmEng, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 명 영문, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_FACL.ROOM_TYPE = #{roomType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 숙소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_FACL.ROOM_CLASS = #{roomClass, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 숙소 등급, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_FACL.SALE_START_DD = #{saleStartDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 판매 시작 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_FACL.SALE_END_DD = #{saleEndDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 판매 종료 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_FACL.CHECK_IN_TM = #{checkInTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크인 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */
AND EZC_FACL.CHECK_OUT_TM = #{checkOutTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크아웃 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */
AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_FACL.ADDR_TYPE = #{addrType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 주소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_FACL.ADDR = #{addr, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 주소, VARCHAR2(200) */
AND EZC_FACL.POST = #{post, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 우편번호, VARCHAR2(7) */
AND EZC_FACL.TEL_NUM = #{telNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 전화 번호, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_FACL.COORD_Y = #{coordY, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_FACL.COORD_X = #{coordX, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_FACL.MIN_AMT = #{minAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 최저 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_FACL.DETAIL_DESC_PC LIKE '%' || #{detailDescPc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 상세 설명 PC, VARCHAR2(4000) */
AND EZC_FACL.DETAIL_DESC_M LIKE '%' || #{detailDescM, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 상세 설명 모바일, VARCHAR2(4000) */
AND EZC_FACL.TRIP_PROP_ID = #{tripPropId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 트립어드바이저 프로퍼티 ID, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_FACL.MAIN_IMG_URL = #{mainImgUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 대표 이미지 URL, VARCHAR2(200) */
AND EZC_FACL.SALE_STOP_DT = #{saleStopDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 판매 중지 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_FACL.API_SYNC_DT = #{apiSyncDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* API 동기화 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_FACL.CONFIRM_STATUS = #{confirmStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 확정 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_FACL.FACL_STATUS = #{faclStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_FACL.REJECT_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{rejectContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 반려 내용, VARCHAR2(1000) */
AND EZC_FACL.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_FACL.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_FACL.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_FACL.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_FACL.FACL_CD DESC /* SQL Body End */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_FACL SET /* 시설 정보 */ FACL_DIV = #{faclDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,PARTNER_GOODS_CD = #{partnerGoodsCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 상품 코드, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,FACL_NM_KOR = #{faclNmKor, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 명 한글, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,FACL_NM_ENG = #{faclNmEng, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 명 영문, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,ROOM_TYPE = #{roomType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 숙소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,ROOM_CLASS = #{roomClass, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 숙소 등급, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,SALE_START_DD = #{saleStartDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 판매 시작 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,SALE_END_DD = #{saleEndDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 판매 종료 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,CHECK_IN_TM = #{checkInTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크인 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,CHECK_OUT_TM = #{checkOutTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크아웃 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,ADDR_TYPE = #{addrType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 주소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,ADDR = #{addr, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 주소, VARCHAR2(200) */ ,POST = #{post, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 우편번호, VARCHAR2(7) */ ,TEL_NUM = #{telNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 전화 번호, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,COORD_Y = #{coordY, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,COORD_X = #{coordX, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MIN_AMT = #{minAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 최저 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,DETAIL_DESC_PC = #{detailDescPc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상세 설명 PC, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,DETAIL_DESC_M = #{detailDescM, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상세 설명 모바일, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,TRIP_PROP_ID = #{tripPropId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 트립어드바이저 프로퍼티 ID, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,MAIN_IMG_URL = #{mainImgUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 대표 이미지 URL, VARCHAR2(200) */ ,IMG_CHANGE_YN = #{imgChangeYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 이미지 변경 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,SALE_STOP_DT = #{saleStopDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 판매 중지 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,API_SYNC_DT = #{apiSyncDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* API 동기화 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,CONFIRM_STATUS = #{confirmStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 확정 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,FACL_STATUS = #{faclStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,REJECT_CONTENT = #{rejectContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 반려 내용, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,FACL_KOR_MORP = #{faclKorMorp, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 한글 형태소 */ ,FACL_ENG_MORP = #{faclEngMorp, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 영문 형태소 */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
